summary:
My whole career has been about technology and interaction with people. My passion lies in the fact to help people achieve their goals. Difficult situations in an IT context are where I stand out the most. Always looking for the right balance between added value by IT solutions and necessary effort to realize these added values.

By being a very diverse professional in the IT landscape, I am able to find the right specialists, direction to the best solution and best practice approach to reach that goal. With a strong business minded view, I am able to create the most valuable business cases for my relations.

Starting out as a teacher, developing myself whilst being a consultant, architect and trusted advisor, I have become a strong consultative IT partner for my relations. Working with several different IT concepts over the years. Centrally managed IT systems, Virtualisation (from servers to workspaces and applications), the new world of working (BYOD/CYOD), Cloud computing and delivering the most secure and reliable platforms for your mission-critical applications in an agile manner with the use of DevOps tools.

I have been working with organizations like hospitals, local governments, schools, financial institutes & diverse mid-sized corporations. In my current position @SENTIA, I help our customers to achieve their goals when it comes to innovative IT projects, mission-critical applications & DevOps minded processes that need a compliant, robust, elastic and secure IT platform as a solid foundation.

@SENTIA we facilitate our relations with all the necessary needs to be able to move fast with their customers, markets and environments.

education.degree_name: Instituut voor Sales en Account Management (ISAM)

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

education.field_of_study: MCSA 2000, MCSA 2003, MCSE 2000, MCSE 2003, Exchange 2003 and 2007, MCDBA SQL 2000, MCT, Security

profile_positions.location: Rotterdam–The Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
I am enabling organisations in their Digital Transformation Journey, by helping them making the right choices when it comes to Cloud, Modern Software Architecture, Integration, Data and AI. While I am doing this, my focus is not just on Technology, but also on if not more on People and Processes.

I am very successful in this, because when I propose changes, I always make sure that the people are behind these changes and really are looking forward to these changes and the continuous learning journey that they will embark on, so they will start to do and achieve great things together.

My main qualities are in making complex situations simple and clear from all kind of perspectives, so that all stakeholders understand the situation properly and everyone is onboard in making the right choices for all their stuff that goes in their (hybrid mixed) cloud, systems and applications. This way I enable organisations, so that they can become/stay the most optimal customer centric focused player in their market, be the main connected party in their market/supply chain, be a top data driven player, the most disruptive innovative player and do not shy away to start experimenting into the future.

I have based my method on enablers around Cloud DevOps engineering, Software engineering, UX/UI designing, Data engineering and -science, AI driven solutions and all the great technologies out there.
profile_positions.title: Jedi Master

profile_positions.description:
Building consulting practice within our BU, based on People & Processes, Public Cloud technologies, Software refactoring, Test-driven development, Agile- & Digital Transformations.
-
Coaching and guiding people to become more effective professionals.
profile_positions.title: Jedi Master

profile_positions.description:
MultiFunctionalPerson

Leading our cell for Azure Landingzone Development
Customer lead for several clients with IaC based environments on AWS
Architect for multiple clients
Responsible for business alignment between high-end technical solution architectures and business-, application-, data- and infrastructural driven requirements. (TOGAF- & ArchiMate certified)
profile_positions.title: Continuity Architect

profile_positions.description:
About Sentia

For more than 15 years Sentia is one of the leading companies for business critical IT-outsourcing and Managed Services in North-Western Europe. With more than 270 employees in the Netherlands, Belgium and Denmark, Sentia focusses on Managed Application Continuity for leading publishers & media companies, digital agencies, banks & insurance companies, retailers, not-for-profit and health organisations.

With an Outsourcing Recommendation score of 100% by Giarte our customers affirm our quality. Critical applications of Achmea, Rabobank, Saxo Bank, Pizza Hut, Centralpoint, Carrefour, Ole & Steen, Deloitte Digital, FocusCura, Sweco and Sanoma are secured and managed on private, public and hybrid cloud-platforms.

Sentia has worked for many years to refine and optimise its own private cloud, the Sentia Cloud, which is designed for mission-critical applications and fully situated in Tier3 datacenters. For public cloud, Sentia is the leading partner as a Managed Service Program Partner of Amazon Web Services. Sentia is certified according to ISO 27001, 14001, 9001, NEN 7510 and has an ISAE 3402 Type II declaration.

Sentia, driven by Continuity
profile_positions.title: Account Manager Public & Health

profile_positions.description:
Pragmatische IT. Direct met korte lijnen. No nonsense ICT dienstverlening. Wij brengen u en uw organisatie naar een hoger niveau qua ICT faciliteiten.

Ik help u met advies betreffende uw volgende stap om uw ICT organisatie op een hoger niveau te brengen. Welke cloud vorm is geschikt voor uw organisatie. Hoe gaat u bottom-line winst realiseren voor uw organisatie door slimme inzet van uw ICT. Wat kunt u het beste doen op het gebied van sourcing van uw ICT capaciteit. Hoe maakt u "het nieuwe werken" tot "het vertrouwde werken".
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Focus on rationalized|dynamic data-centers and cloud computing. I can help your business to professionalize IT services and integrate cloud computing in your IT environment. Content availability with high service to ensure business efficiency, reduce T.C.O. and increase value for your business by realizing "always there & ready IT services".
profile_positions.title: Account Manager new business

profile_positions.description: ICT advisor for organizations in the healthcare, (local) government, profit- & non-profit organizations. Specialized in roadmaps to a more mature IT service management, ICT in the new world of working and improving the quality of your IT services.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the program of presales activities within Qwise. Next to the day to day management, also responsible for quality improvements within the presales processes. Thereby partially responsible for the total quality of delivering services to the end-customers. Relying on the ServQual model for quality assurance.

After sales is also a part of the responsibilities within this role. especially the successful landing of realized sales at the involved operational units. (Projects, Outsourcing and Training center)
profile_positions.title: Manager Presales

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the total management of 3 to 6 projects at the same time within the Qwise program. Projects are managed based on best practices of Prince II. On the other hand projects are often realized with an agile approach by Qwise.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description: Consultant at Qwise, involved in presales, functional designs for centralized workspaces (SBC[Citrix]/VDI[Xendesktop/vmware view/Sun ray]) and technical designs for centralized workspaces (SBC[Citrix]/VDI[Xendesktop/vmware view/Sun ray]). Working with virtualization technologies (VMWARE/XENserver/HyperV), Microsft backoffice products (Windows 2k-2k8/Exchange 2k-2k7/SQL 2k-2k8/WSS & MOSS/SCCM (& SCOM) 2007), workspace management tooling (RES PowerFuse). Technical project leader for implementation projects of the solutions mentioned before.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant
